title: Berries Nicotine Pouches by Iceberg
description: TRY ICEBERG BERRIES NICOTINE POUCHES Wild Berries nicotine pouches by Iceberg. This is for those looking for a powerful nicotine experience with delicious berries flavour. Get a taste of Iceberg Wild Berry's delicious flavour. Each individual nicotine pouch contains a juicy burst of berry goodness. View all Iceberg Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: Berry-flavoured nicotine pouches 20mg Per Gram | 12mg Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Discreet and suitable for all occasions Excellent nicotine experience MORE ABOUT BERRY FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES A deliciously sweet flavour that leaves a fresh aftertaste. There's something refreshing about the taste of wild berries when it comes to nicotine. In addition to their natural sweetness, wild berries are rich and tangy, making them an ideal flavour. MORE ABOUT ICEBERG NICOTINE POUCHES Iceberg Nicotine Pouches are among the finest nicotine pouches on the market. Smoke-free, satisfying alternative to traditional methods, Iceberg offers those who crave a crisp, invigorating nicotine experience. No matter what time of the day you need a refreshing boost, or how long you need to relax after a long day, Iceberg pouches offer a discreet and refreshing alternative.
